products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.

products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

products.title: Lexington Blockout Cream Solar/thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
